titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the solicitation of political contributions by Members, officers, or employees of the House of employees of the United States Government, and to prohibit such solicitations by persons in House office buildings or the Capitol.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to add rule LI to prohibit Representatives and officers or employees of the House from knowingly soliciting political contributions from officers or employees of the United States. Prohibits such solicitation in any office or building of the House. Declares such prohibitions inapplicable to solicitations between Members of Congress.
